1.punchline: A lion would never cheat on his wife but a Tiger Wood.

2.punchline: My first day back at the gym today went well. I did 20 minutes of cardio, 10 minutes on the defibrillator and then 3 days in the hospital.

3.punchline: Why does Usain Bolt suffer from relationship problems?

4.punchline: A tribe in the Amazon rain forest is thought to be responsible for a viscous cannibalistic attack on a group of World Cup supporters yesterday while they were hiking. Police have issued a statement warning people to be on the look out for a man with goofy teeth, short black hair and wearing a Uruguay football shirt.

5.punchline: There’s nothing more entertaining than going to watch a marathon live. My favorite part is the reaction of the runner’s face when I give him a cup of vodka.

6.punchline: Lewis Hamilton recently won the British Grand Prix. Last time a black guy drove that fast he was being shot at.

7.punchline: The England team visited an orphanage today in Poland.

8.punchline: How do you make a pool table laugh?

9.punchline: What sickness does a martial artist get? Kung flu.

10.punchline: Tesco Value Burgers – Low in fat high in Shergar.

12.punchline: The first time I met my wife, I knew she was a keeper. She was wearing massive gloves.

13.punchline: In a bid to promote his image and ease race relations John Terry has kindly donated 100 trumpets to an African orphanage in Nigeria. Apparently he was quoted as saying “Blacks are naturally talented at music and with their big lips they should be great at trumpet playing”.

14.punchline: Hey babe, I’m a real ladies man. I’ve been down more holes than Tiger Woods.

15.punchline: 3 similarities between the World Cup and having sex.

16.punchline: The following conversation took place between a mental patient and a doctor.

17.punchline: Why did the ‘hare’ cross the road?

18.punchline: Q. What do Usain Bolt and a Malaysian air-traffic controller have in common?

19.punchline: Oscar Pistorius may be guilty but to be fair girls spend f*cking ages in the bathroom!

20.punchline: Did you hear the latest story about some major tennis players being involved in witchcraft?? Goran, even he’s a witch.

21.punchline: Since his release on bail Oscar Pistorious has decided to spend the weekend clay pigeon shooting to relax. So far he’s accidentally killed 2 elephants and shot a Jeep that was on safari.

22.punchline: What’s red and beeps? The Manchester United open-top bus reversing back in the garage.

23.punchline: I got injured playing table tennis yesterday. It’s great having the extra surface area but

26.punchline: David Moyes recently appeared at a charity event where he said “AIDS was a terrible disease”. That’s rich coming from him, at least AIDS managed to get into Europe.

27.punchline: Q. What’s brown, 12 inches long, and can do the 100 metres in under 10 seconds?

28.punchline: Apparently racist chanting was heard at the England training ground earlier today. The FA have threatened to remove John Terry from the squad if he does it again.

29.punchline: How many man united fans does it take to pave up a driveway? Depends how thin you slice them.

30.punchline: Just made a small fortune betting on the Euro 2016 football championships.

31.punchline: After receiving a $5 billion donation from the Brazilian government Fifa have just announced that they would like to congratulate Brazil on winning the 2014 World Cup 3-1 against Argentina on 13th July 2014.

32.punchline: After watching TV last night I can’t believe how ruthless and efficient the Germans were. Schindler’s list is a great film.
